text: This is an incomplete list of Filipino full-length films, both mainstream and independently produced, released in theaters and cinemas in 2020. Some films are in production but do not have definite release dates. ==Top grossing films== The films released in 2020 by domestic gross are as follows: {| class="wikitable" style="margin:auto; margin:auto;" |- ! Rank ! Title ! Distributor !
